rComments: The class was interesting- but he didn't do a very good job chosing reading materials. His essay prompts were ridiculous,1 page long(!)but they didn't even explain the assignment well! His grading seems to have gotten easier, but he's still incredibly self-conscious in front of the class. It was rather endearing. But we watched Office Space so yea!

lacks in teaching experience. sometimes it seems as if he doesnt know what he is talking about. in order to really understand and do good you need to go to office hours and ask him to explain. ok teaching.
very high expectations and difficult grader for essays. has discussions about the topic of core class but not about how to write a good essay.

He has high expectations for his students' writings but he doesn't explain the props for the assignments all that well.  Most of the time he's not alert about the core material like other core professors are.  Great thinker but not the best professor, especially for a core class.
